title: They Tried To Shrink An iPhone...
description: (   ) --- LASER GLOW HEADPHONES -  Phonebaby Mini Phone (USA LINK) -  Phonebaby Mini Phone (International) -   This little device bears a resemblance to the iPhone SE yet it runs Android. If Apple decided to make a 2-inch iPhone it would likely look like this. It functions like any other Android device and even features dual sim card slots. Got small hands? Here's your iPhone alternative!  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -

They came from halfway across the world as I'm told.
